summary: This document details an interview conducted by the FBI with an individual who provided massages to Jeffrey Epstein. The interviewee describes her experiences, including the nature of the massages, the environment in Epstein's residence, and her observations regarding the treatment of other girls involved. The document highlights concerns about the potential involvement of underage girls in these activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is described as the individual who requested massages from the interviewee and engaged in inappropriate behavior during these sessions.

persons.name: Leslie
persons.context: Leslie is mentioned as Epstein's assistant who scheduled appointments for the interviewee to provide massages.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The interviewee refers to a friend or roommate who was involved in bringing girls to Epstein for massages.

connections.description: Leslie is described as Epstein's assistant who facilitated the scheduling of massage appointments.
The interviewee's friend or roommate is mentioned as someone who introduced girls to Epstein for massages.
The interviewee refers to her friend or roommate who was involved in the same activities.

events.title: End of Massage Sessions
events.description: The interviewee stopped working at Epstein's residence after approximately four to five months of providing massages.

events.title: Interview Date
events.description: The interview with the individual took place on this date, providing insights into Epstein's activities.

keyFacts: The interviewee was paid $300 for each massage session with Epstein.
The interviewee described Epstein's behavior during massages as inappropriate, including attempts at physical interaction.
The interviewee expressed concerns that some girls involved in the massages may have been underage.
The interviewee was introduced to Epstein through a friend or roommate who was involved in the same activities.
The document indicates that the interviewee was not a minor during her interactions with Epstein.
